H0.text: Plants that can live in sandy soils most likely have the ability to withstand fires.

H1.text: Salt is what plants that can live in sandy soils most likely have the ability to withstand.

H2.text: Cold temperatures are the ability that plants capable of living in sandy soils most likely possess.

H3.text: Dry conditions are the ability that plants that can live in sandy soils most likely have to withstand.

A4.text: These psammophile shrubs are not only edible to grazing animals in the area, they also play a vital role in the stabilisation of desert sand dunes.

A5.text: Compared to other dominant arid xerophytes, an adult R. soongorica, bush has a strong resistance to water scarcity, hence, it is considered a super-xerophytes.
